name: 2019 runner (1 hour game jam 196)
description:
An excellent platformer. Made by a strong team of 8 programmers and artists.

You can win, try to work out how.

Made in 52 minutes, not one hour.

Created during global game jam 2019. Gamejamception.

Some tips:

1. Hold space to charge jumps, jump on release.

2. You can win, think outside the box.

3. No it's not a crash that's meant to happen :)
